commit message: Handle receiving system's events in Handler
Fix 'IllegalStateException' while reading DashboardCategory from parcel
Catch possible OutOfMemoryError while calc-ing a brand color
Follow some of the Android Lint suggestions
Don't allow to dismiss home widgets
Change the type of read-aloud-text to CharSequence
Notification: Use correct primary text color

Create new single-threaded IconFactory

Goodness:
1. Maximum parallel async-tasks limit is no longer important.
2. More control of the loading.
